Content Marketing Specialist

Marketing New York, NY Full-time

ABOUT PLACER.AI

Placer.ai is transforming how organizations understand the physical world. Our location analytics platform provides unprecedented visibility into locations, markets, and consumer behavior. Placer empowers thousands of customers—from Fortune 500 companies to local governments and nonprofits—to make smarter, data-driven decisions.

What sets us apart?

  • Innovation & Privacy: We’ve built the most advanced location intelligence platform while maintaining an uncompromising commitment to privacy.
  • Rapid Growth: We reached $100M in annual recurring revenue within 6 years, achieved unicorn status ($1B+ valuation) in 2022, and continue to expand as one of North America’s fastest-growing tech companies.
  • Recognition: Named one of Forbes America’s Best Startup Employers and a Deloitte Technology Fast 500 company.

THE ROLE

We are seeking a Content Marketing Specialist to create compelling content that showcases the power of location intelligence. You’ll develop content across multiple channels to educate our audience, drive brand awareness, and support our sales and marketing efforts.

RESPONSIBILITIES

  • Content Creation: Develop blog posts, whitepapers, case studies, and thought leadership content
  • Social Media: Manage social media content strategy and execution across platforms
  • Email Marketing: Create engaging email campaigns and newsletters
  • Video Content: Collaborate on video content including webinars and product demos
  • SEO Optimization: Ensure content is optimized for search engines and discoverability
  • Content Strategy: Develop content calendars and editorial strategies
  • Performance Analysis: Track content performance and optimize based on data insights

REQUIREMENTS

Education: Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Communications, Journalism, or related field

Experience:

  • 3+ years of content marketing experience, preferably in B2B SaaS
  • Experience with data-driven or technology-focused content
  • Portfolio demonstrating strong writing and content creation skills

Content Skills:

  • Writing: Exceptional writing and editing abilities across formats
  • SEO: Understanding of SEO best practices and keyword research
  • Social Media: Experience managing B2B social media accounts
  • Email Marketing: Familiarity with email marketing platforms and best practices

Technical Skills:

  • CMS: Experience with WordPress, HubSpot, or similar content management systems
  • Design Tools: Basic knowledge of Canva, Adobe Creative Suite, or similar tools
  • Analytics: Proficiency with Google Analytics, social media analytics, and content performance metrics
  • Marketing Automation: Experience with marketing automation platforms

Soft Skills:

  • Strong storytelling abilities
  • Attention to detail and excellent proofreading skills
  • Ability to translate complex technical concepts into accessible content
  • Collaborative mindset and ability to work with cross-functional teams

PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS

  • Experience in location analytics, retail, or real estate industries
  • Background in data visualization and infographic creation
  • Knowledge of privacy regulations and data governance topics
  • Experience with webinar production and event marketing
  • Understanding of B2B buyer journeys and content mapping

WHY JOIN PLACER.AI?

  • Innovative Content: Create content about cutting-edge location intelligence technology
  • Brand Building: Help shape the voice and narrative of a market-leading company
  • Growth Environment: Work in a fast-paced, high-growth marketing team
  • Creative Freedom: Opportunity to experiment with new content formats and channels
  • Competitive Package: Excellent compensation, equity, and benefits
